In the country of Karnes,  Look what has happened;  The Major Sheriff died, Leaving Román badly wounded.
He struck out for Gonzales Without showing any fear, “Follow me, cowardly rangers,  I am Gregorio Cortez.”
From Belmont he went to the  ranch,   They succeeded in surrounding  him,  Quite a few more than three hundred,  But there he jumped their corral.
Gregorio Cortez went out,  He went towards Laredo They decided not to follow  Because they were afraid of him.
Over by El Encinal,  According to what we hear,  They made him a corral,  And he killed them another sheriff.
Now he has met a Mexican; He says to him haughtily, “Tell me the news; I am Gregorio Cortez.”
